descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course will introduce students to some of the key literatures and paradigms in International Relations Scholarship. (for more information, please contact the professor via email)

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students will acquire basic knowledge of key literature

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Paper presentations and oral participation. Exact distribution to be determined

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: TBD, Contact the Prof. directly for more information
